text: Monica "Nikki" van der Zyl (27 April 1935 – 6 March 2021) was a German voice- over artist. She was known for her dubbing work on the James Bond movie series. Van der Zyl died on 6 March 2021 in London from problems caused by a stroke, aged 85.Nikki van der Zyl (1935–2021) ==References== ==Other websites== * *Official website Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German voice actors Category:German stage actors Category:Actors from Berlin
title: Nikki van der Zyl
